articles.description: Marlain Veal scored six of his 20 points in the final seconds to help Southeastern Louisiana hold off McNeese for a 74-67 victory on Saturday.
articles.headline: Veal has 20 points as SE Louisiana holds off McNeese 74-67

articles.description: After VCU's Issac Vann knocks down a 3-pointer late in the first half, Jalen Crutcher heaves up a shot and gets it to go at the buzzer.
articles.headline: Dayton's Crutcher hits shot from beyond half court

images.caption: After VCU's Issac Vann knocks down a 3-pointer late in the first half, Jalen Crutcher heaves up a shot and gets it to go at the buzzer.
images.name: Dayton's Crutcher hits shot from beyond half court

articles.description: Dayton Gumm scored 15 points to lead four Austin Peay starters in double figures and the Governors beat Eastern Illinois 76-69 on Saturday, giving the Governors their 10th Ohio Valley Conference victory of the season, the most for the program since...
articles.headline: Austin Peay picks up 10th conference win of season

articles.description: Virginia Tech head coach Buzz Williams says in order for his team to keep its pace they have match attempted field goals with the Cavaliers as the Hokies enter the half with a 33-26 lead.
articles.headline: Williams: 'We have to shoot as much as they do'

images.caption: Virginia Tech head coach Buzz Williams says in order for his team to keep its pace they have match attempted field goals with the Cavaliers as the Hokies enter the half with a 33-26 lead.
images.name: Williams: 'We have to shoot as much as they do'

articles.description: Christian Keeling scored 20 points and Charleston Southern closed on a 7-0 surge to beat Presbyterian 64-54 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Charleston Southern uses 7-0 surge, beats Presbyterian 64-54

articles.description: Isaiah Roby had 10 points, 11 rebounds and two blocked shots and Nebraska opened up 16-point leads in both halves and didn't let Rutgers get closer than 10 points in the last 14 minutes to take a 67-55 win Saturday.
articles.headline: Nebraska wins 7th Big Ten game in last 8, 67-55 over Rutgers

videos.description: Bruno Fernando gets the dish from Jared Nickens and finishes with authority in the first half.
videos.headline: Maryland's Fernando rocks the  rim

videos.description: Oshae Brissett brilliantly spins past his defender and lays it in through contact for the Orange.
videos.headline: Syracuse's Brissett turns on spin cycle

videos.description: Kevin Huerter gets the assist from Justin Jackson and drains the shot from downtown for the Terps.
videos.headline: Maryland's Huerter drills deep 3-pointer

videos.description: Oshae Brissett cuts to the basket and hits the layup with defenders all over him in the second half.
videos.headline: Syracuse's Brissett attacks the rim with ease

videos.description: Kevin Huerter is on fire from beyond the arc for the Terps late in the second half.
videos.headline: Maryland's Huerter sinks clutch 3

videos.description: Despite Kevin Huerter's 23 points, including seven 3-pointers, the Orange hold on for a victory at home 72-70.
videos.headline: Cuse holds on for win over Maryland
